name: For Charity
description: At a Starfleet charity costume gala, dignitaries arrive for a nice evening. Quark, dressed as a Klingon, falls to the floor! Doctor Bashir carries him to a quiet room for treatment, as Riker asks your help to secure the gala without disrupting it.
rules:
— Unique Supply Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
— Using any version of W. Riker, Bashir, or Quark will provide a bonus to Supply Missions.
— Every Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
— Community Rewards are only available during Phase 1. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
— In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Supply Missions!

adventures.name: Gauze and Effect
adventures.description: Locate some medical supplies for Doctor Bashir.

adventures.name: Holding Your Liquor
adventures.description: Test drinks at the event to see which, if any, is poisoned.

adventures.name: Spoiled Sport
adventures.description: Scan samples of food currently at the buffet.

adventures.name: Diplomatic Immunity
adventures.description: Help Doctor Bashir engineer an antidote to the poison.

rewards.name: For Charity
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Quark
rewards.flavor: After a Klingon dies in Quark's bar, his widow Grilka takes Quark to Qo'noS.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

goals.flavor: Help the Federation maintain order and secure the event.
Help the Ferengi Traditionalists save the other Ferengi.
Help the Ferengi Alliance cover up the disturbance.

next_threshold_rewards.name: Chronitons
next_threshold_rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

screens.text: "Commander Riker, I wish I were seeing you under better circumstances. Quark just collapsed, and I've removed him to a private area. My initial examination of him suggests he's been poisoned. We've got to evacuate this event immediately."
"Ruin the Federation's top charity event of the year? No way. We can work around this without shutting the event down, I'm sure of it. Doctor Bashir, what does Quark need?"

"I need to learn more about this poison to synthesize an antidote. The best I can do in the meantime is keep Quark comfortable and out of pain... But Commander... Time is not on our side. I didn't think I'd need to bring medical supplies to a charity ball, but here we are."
"Understood. Captain, I'll do an initial security sweep of the hall, while you help Doctor Bashir obtain whatever equipment he needs to help Quark. We don't have much time."
